alert.note: Alert for Pueblo Vicinity, Pueblo County Below 6300 Feet; Walsenburg Vicinity, Upper Huerfano River Basin Below 7500 Ft; Wet Mountains between 6300 and 10000Ft (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 20 at 11:31PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Huerfano and southwestern Pueblo Counties through 1215 AM MDT... At 1130 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 10 miles east of Greenhorn Mountain, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph, torrential rainfall, and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Colorado City. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Pueblo Vicinity, Pueblo County Below 6300 Feet; Walsenburg Vicinity, Upper Huerfano River Basin Below 7500 Ft; Wet Mountains between 6300 and 10000Ft
